nodes.text: The Blackscale Clan was a Trandoshan mercenary clan based on the species's homeworld, Trandosha. It had a contract to deliver enslaved Wookiees to the Galactic Empire, and so the clan's members raided the Wookiee homeworld of Kashyyyk mercilessly.

In the new Star Wars canon, the Blackscale Clan was first mentioned in the 2019 Fantasy Flight Games roleplaying game supplement Allies and Adversaries. The clan originated in Star Wars Legends, where it first appeared in Rage of the Wookiees, a 2005 expansion to the video game Star Wars Galaxies.
